head.supplied: Melbourne Botanic Garden 25/10/72 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you that your letter of the 10th of this month was submitted to the trustees of the Royal Park at a meeting held this day, and t...

div.p: A345 Royal Park Zoological Society letter & minute book, p.54, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

I have the honor to inform you that your letter of the 10th of this month was submitted to the trustees of the Royal Park at a meeting held this day, and that my colleagues have instructed me to express their regret, that it is not within their power to concede the privilege of precedence for using any portion of the Park to the Hotham Cricket Club

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be Sir
